percent.description: Adds a percent column to the DataFrame.

col.description: The name of the column to calculate percentages from.

roundn.description: The number of decimal places to round to. Defaults to 1.

returns.description: The DataFrame with a new column containing the percentages.

diffp.description: Add a diff column to the main dataframe: calculate the difference

diffcol.description: The column name for which to calculate the difference.

name.description: The name of the resulting difference column. Defaults to "diff".

decimals.description: The number of decimal places to round the difference to. Defaults to 0.

diffpp.description: Add a diff column to the main dataframe: calculate the difference
diffpp.long_description: in percentage from the previous value.

diffcol.description: The column name for which to calculate the difference.

name.description: The name of the resulting difference column. Defaults to "diff".

decimals.description: The number of decimal places to round the difference to. Defaults to 0.

diffn.description: Add a diff column to the main dataframe: calculate the difference

diffcol.description: The column name for which to calculate the difference.

name.description: The name of the resulting difference column. Defaults to "diff".

decimals.description: The number of decimal places to round the difference to. Defaults to 0.

diffnp.description: Add a diff column to the main dataframe: calculate the difference
diffnp.long_description: in percentage from the next value.

diffcol.description: The column name for which to calculate the difference.

name.description: The name of the resulting difference column. Defaults to "diff".

decimals.description: The number of decimal places to round the difference to. Defaults to 0.

diffm.description: Add a difference column to the main dataframe: calculate the

diffcol.description: The column name for which to calculate the difference.

name.description: The name of the resulting difference column. Defaults to "diff".

decimals.description: The number of decimal places to round the difference to. Defaults to 0.

diffmp.description: Add a difference column to the main dataframe: calculate the
diffmp.long_description: difference in percentage from the column mean.

diffcol.description: The column name for which to calculate the difference.

name.description: The name of the resulting difference column. Defaults to "diff".

decimals.description: The number of decimal places to round the difference to. Defaults to 0.

cvar_.description: Returns the coefficient of variation (CV) of a column in percentage.

col.description: The name of the column for which to calculate the coefficient of variation.

returns.description: The coefficient of variation of the column in percentage.

lreg_.description: Add a column with the the linear regression for given x/y column

xcol.description: The name of the x column for which to calculate the linear regression.

ycol.description: The name of the y column for which to calculate the linear regression.

name.description: The name of the new column. Defaults to "regression"
